sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Space suits are vital for anyone who plans to travel in space. Space suits also come in handy when exterior repairs are needed between departure and arrival, or when stepping out into a totally unknown atmosphere. The TaggeCo. Standard X (actually made by a dozen secondary manufacturing and distribution factories on Kuat, Fondor, Bilbringi, and Corellia) is a popular model for numerous starships or space stations. It does not include long-term life support, but is useful for short spacewalks. It includes small thrusters to aid in movement, magboots for adhesion in weightlessness, a comlink, and microtool fittings. Like most suits, it also comes with repair packs to seal suit tears or gasket leaks.  Models Include: TaggeCo. Standard X Space Suit.</description> <encumbrance>4</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Space Suit</name> <number>GEAR0001087</number> <price>100</price> <range/> <rarity>1</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 21:37:52</sys_created_on> <sys_id>54310cb42f94a450e0f497eef699b608</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 21:37:52</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
